## Subcategory

## Article Content

HOME
REPORTS
Offers Reports

If the Offers app is enabled for your account, the following Offers reports are available in the Reports app.

Offers reports can help you track which offers have been used, applied discount amounts, and more.

Link copied
Offers Usage Report

The Offers Usage report includes offers usage details, including sale #, usage date, and applied discount amount.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Offers Usage report.

Column

	

Description




Sale #

	

The sale where the offer was used.




Date

	

The date the offer was used.




Client

	

The client who used the offer.




Offer

	

The name of the offer.




Sale Total (Before Discount)

	

The sale total before the offer was applied.




Applied Discount

	

The applied discount amount.




Sale Total (After Discount)

	

The sale total after the offer was applied.

Link copied
Offers Summary Report

The Offers Summary report includes a summary of which offers have been used.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Offers Summary report.

Column

	

Description




Offer

	

The name of the offer.




Code

	

The offer code.




# Used

	

The number of times this offer was used.




Discounts

	

The total amount of applied discounts.
